DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to analyse baseline data on IS in order to monitor the possibility of increased risk of IS in children aged <12 months after introduction of the Rotarix vaccination in Japan.
DOC.brief_title: Study on the Incidence of Intussusception (IS) in Children Aged < 12 Months in Japan
DOC.criteria: A male or female infant aged < 12 months at the time of IS diagnosis and affiliated to the JMDCMDB database. An IS case should be identified as per the ICD10 diagnostic codeK56.1 (anyfield listed), examination codes, and procedural codes.
